mapper.select: select substr(orderwork_date,5,2) as orderwork_date, trunc(avg(produce_cnt)) as produce_cnt, avg(produce_badcnt) as produce_badcnt, trunc(avg(produce_badcnt)/avg(produce_cnt)*100) as produce_processrate, process_name from produce_table group by substr(orderwork_date,5,2), process_name order by substr(orderwork_date,5,2)
